TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ConsoleCancelEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ConsoleCancelEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class ConsoleCancelEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以通过同时按中断控制台应用程序进程修改键和console 键 (Ctrl + C)，或修改键和中断的控制台键 (Ctrl + Break)。A user can interrupt a console application process by simultaneously pressing the modifier key and the console key (Ctrl+C), or the modifier key and the Break console key (Ctrl+Break). 因此，.NET Framework 提供到事件处理程序的对象事件，以指定是否应取消进程。The .NET Framework consequently provides a object to the event handler for the event to specify whether the process should be cancelled. 如果属性设置为`true`事件处理程序中，恢复过程; 否则，该进程将终止。If the property is set to `true` in the event handler, the process is resumed; otherwise, the process is terminated. 默认情况下，值属性是`false`，并在进程终止。By default, the value of the property is `false`, and the process terminates. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类处理的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to handle an event. [!code-cpp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cpp/ckp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cs/ckp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/vb/ckp.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Cancel { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示同时按下 修改键和 控制台键 (Ctrl+C) 或 Ctrl+Break 键是否会终止当前进程。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether simultaneously pressing the modifier key and the console key (Ctrl+C) or the Ctrl+Break keys terminates the current process.

summary.span: 默认值为 ，这将终止当前进程。

span.span: The default is , which terminates the current process.

value.span: 如果当前进程在事件处理程序结束时应继续，则为 ；如果当前进程应终止，则为 。

span.span: if the current process should resume when the event handler concludes; if the current process should terminate.

value.span: 默认值为 ；当前进程将在事件处理程序返回时终止。

span.span: The default value is ; the current process terminates when the event handler returns.

value.span: 如果为 ，当前进程将继续。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将自动初始化为`false`时的处理程序事件调用。The property is automatically initialized to `false` when the handler for the event is invoked. 值当事件处理程序完成时，属性确定当前进程是否恢复或终止。The value of the property when the event handler finishes determines whether the current process resumes or terminates. 在集运算中按下 Ctrl + C 之后，指定`true`以指示当前进程应恢复时事件处理程序结束，或`false`以指示应终止当前进程。In a set operation after Ctrl+C is pressed, specify `true` to indicate that the current process should resume when the event handler concludes, or `false` to indicate that the current process should terminate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性处理的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to handle an event. [!code-cpp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cpp/ckp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cs/ckp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/vb/ckp.vb#1)]

para.span: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，尝试设置属性如果事件调用用户按 Ctrl + Break 引发异常。

span.span: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], attempting to set the property to if the event was invoked by the user pressing Ctrl+Break threw an exception.

para.span: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以设置属性用户按下 Ctrl + Break 和取消的应用程序终止之后。

span.span: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can set the property to after the user presses Ctrl+Break and cancel the termination of the application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SpecialKey As ConsoleSpecialKey
public: property ConsoleSpecialKey SpecialKey { ConsoleSpecialKey get(); };

summary.span: 获取中断当前进程的修改键和控制台键的组合。

span.span: Gets the combination of modifier and console keys that interrupted the current process.

value.span: 一个枚举值指定中断当前进程的组合键。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the key combination that interrupted the current process.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性处理的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to handle an event. [!code-cpp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cpp/ckp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cs/ckp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/vb/ckp.vb#1)]
